snippet: Lakhdar Brahimi’s latest mission — starting Syria peace talks — has proved to be among the most stubborn of the many conflicts he has mediated on behalf of the United Nations.
abstract: United Nations special envoy Lakhdar Brahimi's mission to start Syrian peace talks has proved to be among the most stubborn of the many conflicts he has mediated on behalf of the UN; Brahimi refuses to stop talking about peace talks, despite the difficulties he has faced, which include the fact that neither side in the conflict seems interested in participating.
lead_paragraph: Lakhdar Brahimi’s latest mission — starting Syria peace talks — has proved to be among the most stubborn of the many conflicts he has mediated on behalf of the United Nations.

headline.main: Few Eager to Talk Peace in Syria, but a Mediator Won’t Stop
headline.print_headline: Few Eager to Talk Peace in Syria, but a Mediator Won’t Stop

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
